org.waarp.ftp.core.data

Class FtpDataAsyncConn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.ftp.core.data.FtpDataAsyncConn

  • public class FtpDataAsyncConn
extends Object
    Main class that handles Data connection using asynchronous connection with Netty
